column1: Weighted MRI image size (128, 256, 1) in T2, depicting the head of a man of 37 years old, of sagittal section n°178 beginning from the right hemisphere of the skull. We observe the following characteristics: the white matter of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 2110.6934 mm³, the cortex of right cerebral hemisphere of volume 5871.9727 mm³ and the right cerebellar cortex of volume 729.0527 mm³.
